property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. Your next attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. E [Once per turn]: If this attack's printed damage is 4 or less, you may discard 1 card from your hand in addition to momentum to pay for its Multiple cost.

card.name: Atone for the Sin of Weakness!

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If this attack's printed damage is 4 or less, destroy 1 of your opponent's assets. If you did, draw 1 card. R Remove: After your opponent plays an ability that modifies the speed or damage of an attack, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack is played, it gets +1 or -2 to its Multiple rating. Deadlock E: Your attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Opponent's turn]: Your opponent loses 1 vitality for each card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have played this attack's Multiple ability, draw 1 card. E Discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this turn, you may discard 1 card from your hand in addition to momentum each time you pay the cost to play a Multiple ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you played this attack's Multiple ability, destroy 1 of your opponent's assets or foundations. E: If your opponent has no assets, this attack and your next attack get +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack's printed damage is 4 or less, it gains Multiple:1. R Destroy: After you play a Multiple ability, draw 1 card. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your next attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage. E Flip: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Remove 1 face down card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Twice per turn] Lose 1 vitality: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may remove the revealed card. If you do, add the top card of your discard pile to the top of your deck. R [Twice per turn]: After an attack with 2 or fewer printed keywords deals damage, gain 2 vitality. You may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your Ranged or Weapon attacks get +1 speed and +1 damage. This card does not count towards progressive difficulty. F: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck and replace them in any order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose 2 vitality: After you play a Ranged or Weapon attack, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has 2 or fewer keywords, your attack gets +2 speed. Desperation E Commit: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may remove the revealed cards. If you do, add 2 cards from your discard pile to the top of your deck in any order. [All] E: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage. E: Your next Ranged or Weapon attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard the top card of your deck: Your opponent loses 1 vitality. E Discard the top card of your deck: Gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has the Ranged or Weapon keyword, this attack gets +3 or -2 damage. Desperation E: Your Ranged or Weapon attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with 2 or fewer printed keywords gets +3 speed. If it deals damage, gain 3 vitality. R Flip: After you reveal any number of cards from the top of your deck, gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Reveal the top card of your deck. R Flip: After your opponent plays a non-character ability that causes 1 or more cards to leave your deck or discard pile, cancel it. You may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Each ability on this character is only playable once per turn. R Reveal 1 attack from your hand: After your Safe or Weapon attack resolves, add it to your hand. E: If you have 6 or fewer foundations, your next card gets -2 difficulty. E: If you have 3 or fewer foundations, your next card gets -3 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your Safe or Weapon attack resolves, add it to your hand and lose vitality equal to its printed difficulty. Your next attack gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you have 6 or fewer foundations, add 1 Safe or Weapon attack from your card pool to your hand. R Commit: After 1 of your foundations leaves your staging area or is committed due to your opponent's effect, your opponent adds 1 foundation to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your next attack gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack loses Safe and gains Powerful:5. E: Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their hand. If you have 6 or fewer foundations you may add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Reveal 1 Safe or Weapon attack from your hand: Your next card ignores progressive difficulty. Only playable if you have 6 or fewer foundations. E: Draw 2 cards. Only playable if you have played at least 2 copies of this attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation: After this card is added to your staging area, gain 3 vitality. E: If there are 6 or fewer foundations in your staging area, your Safe or Weapon attack gets +1 speed.

card.name: Last of the Ling Sheng Su

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Gain 1 vitality. Only playable if you have 6 or fewer foundations. E Destroy: Your Safe attack gets +3 damage. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is committed due to a Stun ability or to pay the cost of your ability, your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Ready 1 of your foundations that has not been readied this Combat Phase. Your attack gets +1 speed and +3 damage. E [Twice per turn]: Add 1 foundation to your card pool face up. Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: Add 1 foundation from your discard pile to your hand or from your card pool to your staging area. Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you add any number of cards to your momentum, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. E [Twice per turn]: Your Fury attack gets +2 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +2 damage for each foundation in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Discard X momemtum: Ready X foundations and draw X cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have more momemtum than your opponent, draw 1 card. E: Add 1 foundation from your card pool to your momemtum. This attack gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is committed due to a Stun ability, ready 1 of your other foundations. E [Card Pool]: Your attack gets +2 damage. You may add this card to your staging area face down committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Card Pool]: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. If this attack has Fury, you may add this card to your staging area face down committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent's Combat Phase begins, ready this foundation. R [Twice per turn]: After this foundation is readied or committed, ready 1 other foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (5+): Your Weapon attack gains Stun:1. E (5+): Your Stun attack gets +3 damage. E [Once per turn]: If this attack's damage is at least double its printed damage, change its zone to low and your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If your Stun or Weapon attack is not blocked, your next attack gets +4 damage and is unblockable. R Remove: After your opponent plays an action card or Stun ability, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your Stun or Weapon attack gets +2 damage. Playable while committed. R Commit: After your attack is blocked, add 1 Stun or Weapon attack from your card pool to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (5+): You may add 1 copy of 'Purifying Thrust' from your discard pile to your staging area face down committed. If you did, this attack gets +2 damage. E (5+): This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: Add up to 2 Weapon cards from your card pool to your staging area face down. Your opponent may discard 2 cards to cancel this effect. E (5+): This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If you have added any number of cards to your staging area this turn, this attack gets +2 to its Stun rating. E (5+): This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Stun or Weapon attack gets +2 damage. E Destroy: Your attack gets +2 damage. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip, discard 1 card: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage for each printed keyword on the discarded card. If you discarded a Stun or Weapon card, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Discard Pile]: After you check this card during your attack's Enhance Step, it gets +2 damage or gains Stun:2. E Flip: Your Stun or Weapon attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your face up attacks with printed damage exactly double their printed speed gets +2 damage. R [Once per turn]: After your blocked attack resolves, add it to your hand. E: If your attack is not blocked, your opponent discards the top 3 cards of their deck. Your opponent loses 1 vitality for each attack discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove, lose 2 vitality: After your opponent plays a response ability, they lose 4 vitality. E Remove: If your attack's printed damage is exactly double its printed speed, draw 2 cards and discard 1 card, then your opponent discards the top 3 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your non-throw attack is completely blocked, your opponent discards the top 10 cards of their deck. Your opponent loses 1 vitality for each attack discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum, discard 1 card: Add 1 action card from your discard pile to your hand. Combo E: If this attack is completely blocked, your opponent discards the top 6 cards of their deck. They lose 1 vitality for each attack card discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack cannot be partially blocked. Combo E Discard 1 momemtum: This attack gets +8 damage. Only playable if the attack immediately preceding this attack has a printed damage that is exactly double its printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent must lose 2 vitality as an additional cost to play action cards. Combo E Lose 2 vitality: This attack gets +2 speed and +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 2 vitality: If your attack is blocked, your next non-Throw attack gets +2 damage. E Remove: This attack gets -X speed. X equals its printed speed. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +X damage. X equals this attack's printed speed. Only playable if this attack's printed damage is exactly double its printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Effects on this card cannot reduce your opponent to 0 vitality. After this card is discarded, your opponent loses 1 vitality. After this card is committed due to your opponent's Stun ability, your opponent loses 2 vitality. E [Once per turn] Discard 1 card: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block with a foundation card, add it to your staging area. E (4+): This attack gets +3 or -2 damage and its damage cannot receive any more bonuses or penalties. Your opponent may flip 1 foundation to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool] Remove: After you block with this card, your opponent flips 2 foundations. Your opponent may discard 1 card to cancel this effect. E Remove: This attack gets +X or -X damage. X equals the number of your opponent's face down foundations. Your opponent may flip 2 foundations to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's face down foundations. E Commit: This attack gets -1 damage for each of your opponent's face down foundations. Your opponent may flip 1 foundation to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: Unflip up to 3 of your opponent's face down foundations. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total printed control values of the unflipped cards. Your opponent may flip 3 foundations to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent has more face down foundations than you do, this attack gets +2 damage. E: After this attack resolves, you may add it to your staging area face down. Your opponent may flip 1 foundation to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent flips 2 foundations. Your opponent may discard 1 card to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your opponent plays an attack, you may play the first enhance during its Enhance Step. Playable while committed. E Commit, discard 2 cards: Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is added to your staging area, you may add 1 other foundation to your hand. E Commit, flip: Unflip 1 foundation. Your attack gets +2 damage. Your opponent may flip 1 foundation to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack, discard the top card of your deck. If you discarded a foundation, add it to your staging area committed. If you did not discard a foundation, ready this card. Your opponent may flip 1 foundation to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R (4+): After an attack is blocked, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations. E: This attack gets +2 or -2 speed. If it deals less than its printed damage, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: This attack gets -1 damage and may not receive damage bonuses for the rest of the Enhance Step. R Remove: After an attack deals less than its printed damage, commit 2 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may block with this card from your staging area as if it were in your hand. After you block an attack with this card, that attack deals 1 damage. E [Twice per turn] Flip 1 foundation: Both players commit 1 face up foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momemtum: After this attack resolves, remove it and add 1 copy of 'Guardian's Judgement' from your discard pile to your hand. E: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals less than its printed damage, flip 1 of your opponent's committed assets or foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: Your opponent commits 2 foundations. Flip 1 of your opponent's foundations. E: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's committed foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: This attack gets -1 damage. Your next attack gets +2 damage. R Flip: After your opponent plays an ability that reduces your control check, commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Discard Pile] Remove: After you check this card, gain 2 vitality. E Flip: If you are at maximum vitality, this attack gets +2 or -4 speed. If it is blocked, your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block a Throw attack with this card, it deals 1 damage and your opponent commits 1 foundation. E Flip: If this attack's speed or damage is less than printed, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is the only attack in its owner's card pool, it gets +3 or -3 speed. R [Once per turn]: After a blocked attack resolves, discard all cards from both card pools and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: Discard 1 card from your card pool. R Remove: After you are dealt damage, discard 1 card from both players' card pools. Your opponent's next attack gets -3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R (6+): After any number of cards leave a card pool during the Combat Phase, draw 1 card. E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards that have left either card pool this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Lose 2 vitality: Discard 1 card from your card pool and draw 1 card. E: This attack gets +1 damage for each card that has left either card pool this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is the only card in your card pool, change this attack's Powerful rating to 6 and draw 1 card. E Discard 1 momemtum: This attack cannot be blocked by Weapon cards. E: Add 1 card from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 2 vitality: This attack gets +2 damage. Discard it after it resolves. Only playable if this is the only attack in your card pool and you have not discarded any cards from your card pool this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you partially block a Weapon attack with this card, it deals 0 damage. E Commit: If this is the only attack in your card pool, it gets +2 damage. If it is completely blocked by a Weapon card, it still deals 2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 2 vitality: If this is the only attack in its owner's card pool, it gets +2 or -2 speed. Desperation F Destroy: Discard 1 card from either card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momemtum: After your opponent plays an ability on a Weapon card, cancel it. R [Your turn] Flip: After your opponent plays an attack, add it to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Twice per turn]: After an attack is blocked, you may play 1 attack with a printed damage of 3 (no check necessary) after this attack resolves. You may not play a reversal to this attack. E [Twice per turn]: Your attack gains Stun:1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After your opponent plays an attack with a printed damage that is greater than or equal to your current vitality, ready up to 5 cards in your staging area. E Remove: Your attack with printed damage of 3 gets +3 damage and gains Stun:3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Twice per turn]: This attack gets +2 to its Stun rating. E [Twice per turn]: If your attack has a printed damage of 3, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase and your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your other attacks with a printed damage of 3 get +1 speed and +1 damage. E: Add 1 copy of 'Mei Guei Hua' from your discard pile to your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: You may discard attacks with a printed damage of 3 or less from your card pool in addition to momemtum to pay for this attack's Multiple cost. E Discard 1 momemtum: This attack gains Stun:3 or commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove, ready 1 foundation: After your opponent's unblockable attack resolves, you may attempt to play 1 attack with a printed damage of 3 from your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase. Your attack with a printed damage of 3 gets +2 or +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, flip: Add 1 attack with a printed damage o 3 from your discard pile to your hand or card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (5+): Your next printed high attack gets +3 damage. Your next printed mid attack gets +3 speed. R [Once per turn]: After you make a check, that check gets +2. If the checked card was a Weapon card, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After you make a check, it gets +2. E (7+) Remove, discard 1 Weapon card: Remove this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn] (7+): After you play a Weapon card, your opponent destroys 1 foundation. E (5+): If you have 3 or more Weapon cards in your card pool, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage for each Weapon card in your card pool. [All] E: If your opponent is at Desperation, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: If this attack is not blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality and you draw 3 cards. E (4+): If your opponent is at Desperation, destroy 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard up to 2 Multiple copies of this attack from your card pool. This attack gets +3 speed and +3 damage for each Multiple copy discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F (7+): Add the top card of your deck to your momemtum. If your character is Yoshimitsu you may gain 4 vitality instead. F [Once per turn] Discard 1 momemtum: Add 1 Weapon card from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you play this card, your next check to play a Weapon card gets +2. E (4+): Your mid attack gets +1 damage. E (4+) Your high attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Switch this Weapon attack's speed and damage values. E Flip: If there are 3 or more Weapon cards in your card pool, destroy 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: This attack gets -5 speed. E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difference between its speed and its printed speed. R: After your opponent's blocked attack resolves, play a Reversal from your discard pile as a Reversal. Remove the played attack after it resolves or leaves the card pool.

card.name: Know the Power of the Abyss!

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove, discard the top 10 cards of your deck: Reduce this attack's speed to 0. Add 1 Reversal from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Seal 1 of your opponent's foundations. R (4+): After your opponent plays an ability on a foundation during the Enhance Step, this attack gets -1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Opponent's turn]: If this attack is not blocked, your opponent destroys 1 ready foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difference between its current speed and printed speed. E: Seal 1 of your opponent's foundations. This attack gets +X speed. X equals the printed difficulty of the sealed foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momemtum: Seal all non-character cards in both staging areas. E [Opponent's turn]: Seal your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This foundation cannot be destroyed by your opponent's effects. R (5+): After any number of foundations leave your staging area due to your opponent's effect, your opponent loses 2 vitality. E Commit: Your Reveal attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: This attack gets -2 speed. If it is a Weapon attack, it gets -3 speed instead. E Flip, discard 1 card: Add 1 asset card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Each ability on this card is playable while committed. R Remove: After an enhance ability on a non-character, non-Weapon card is played, cancel it. E Flip: Return this attack to its printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your attack]: Your opponent discards the top 3 cards of their deck. If no attacks were discarded this way, draw 1 card and your opponent discards 5 cards from the top of their deck. E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent discards the top 3 cards of their deck. If all of those cards share the same control, this attack gets +6 or -6 damage.
